entry.title: Pashinyan addresses nation, says new constitution necessary

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan addresses nation, says new constitution necessary
media:group.media:description:
üìç Ruben Vardanyan, the former government leader of Nagorno-Karabakh who is currently on a sham trial in Baku, declared a hunger strike to protest what he describes as a ‚Äújudicial farce‚Äù being conducted against him by Azerbaijani authorities. üìç During his address to the nation, Armenia‚Äôs Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan called for a constitutional referendum. üìç Adapting to the unpredictable Trump-Vance administration: https://youtu.be/JmIerRJbo4c?si=7MpsaUQOj5Fsc9JF
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #dailyarmenia

media:group.media:title: Unmasking the Kremlin-Baku tensions
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of Insights, host Eric Hacopian tackles a range of issues facing Armenia. He first takes on the controversial remarks made by the Armenian speaker of parliament regarding the defense of Artsakh, then explores the introduction of Armenia's new self-declared tax system. Finally, he delves into the complex dynamics between Russia and Azerbaijan, unpacking the diplomatic fallout from the Kremlin's downing of an Azerbaijani airliner and the implications for Armenia's regional positioning.
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #insightswitherichacopian

entry.title: Du monde dans les librairies: la Journ√©e du don de livres en Arm√©nie a commenc√©

media:group.media:title: Du monde dans les librairies: la Journ√©e du don de livres en Arm√©nie a commenc√©
media:group.media:description:
Chaque 19 f√©vrier, les Arm√©nien c√©l√®brent la Journ√©e du don de livres. En ce jour, les libraires am√©nagent leur devantures pour accueillir les lecteurs.
Ce jour-l√† n‚Äôa pas √©t√© choisi par hasard. Il s‚Äôagit de l‚Äôanniversaire du c√©l√®bre po√®te arm√©nien Hovhann√®s Toumanian. Pour l‚Äôoccasion, les mus√©es, caf√©s et librairie d‚ÄôErevan donnent acc√®s √† des milliers de livres. Les communaut√©s arm√©niennes du monde entier organisent de nombreux √©v√©nements : des livres sont donn√©s √† des biblioth√®ques, des orphelinats, des √©coles pour lui redonner toute son importance.

entry.title: EU border mission vows to continue work despite Azerbaijani threats

media:group.media:title: EU border mission vows to continue work despite Azerbaijani threats
media:group.media:description:
üìç The European Union border monitoring mission in Armenia says it has contributed to a significant decrease in tensions along the border, as it begins its second two-year mandate. üìç The Armenian Patriarchate of Jerusalem warns its properties outside the Old City may be confiscated by the municipality due to a disputed taxation issue. üìç Armenia‚Äôs electricity company unveils an ambitious modernization project to address frequent blackouts affecting Yerevan.

media:group.media:title: Armenia‚Äôs special day for books #shorts
media:group.media:description:
Every February 19, Armenians celebrate the birthday of their national poet Hovhannes Tumanyan, with a Book Giving Holiday to share their love of reading.
